    @allure.story("Positive - Get list of my promos")
    def test_get_my_promos_success(self, authenticated_api: ApiFacade):
        """
        Positive test:
        Verify that endpoint returns valid structure for my promos list
        """
        with allure.step("Send GET request to fetch my promos"):
            response = authenticated_api.carwash.get_my_promo()
    
        with allure.step("Check status code == 200"):
